phrases: I am sure I will grant your wish.

About the observatory, and about the time we all played together.

But it was not like that.
Do not come out dressed like that.
I did a good job cracking the eggs today.

Sorry, I have to go out.

Then I do not intend to forgive her or apologize to her.

That is why I want to know.

it has nothing to do with the fact that I do not get along with Yuzuki.

but if this whole class cooperates,
